participant_1.background:
I've been taking ballet lessons behind my parents' backs.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
i want to move.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
i love people with a sense of humor.

participant_2.background:
I like people who are understanding of my diet and phobia.
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
i am from georgia.

content.text: Hello! I'm from Georgia too! What part are you from?
I'm from the suburbs of Atlanta.
Nice! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights. I also love gardening and doing yard work.
That's cool! I like to spend time with friends and go out dancing. I also love cooking and trying new recipes.
I'm not much of a dancer but I love trying new recipes too! What's your favorite dish to cook?
My favorite dish to cook is a chicken parmigiana. It's a classic and it's always a hit with my friends.
Chicken parmigiana sounds delicious! I'm a vegetarian so I don't eat meat but I bet it would be really good with tofu.
You could definitely make it with tofu! I've never tried it but I bet it would be really good.
Maybe I'll try making it next time I cook. Thanks for the idea!
You're welcome! I'm always happy to share recipes.
Well I'm going to get going. It was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a great day!
